column1: 'Medieval Imaginations' provides a database of images
to enable you to explore the interface between the literature and visual
culture of medieval England. It has been compiled to provide images corresponding
to the main episodes dramatized in the English Mystery Plays
these present the medieval view of human history from the Creation to
the Last Judgement. These biblical stories
would have been instantly recognisable to a medieval audience.
